text:
Most Asian stocks rose while the yen declined after a landslide election victory for Japan Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, paving the path for a continuation of loose monetary policy.











The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of NSE Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, climbed 0.34 percent to 10,202 as of 6:45 a.m.






Here’s a quick look at all that could influence equities on Monday.
title: All You Need To Know Going Into Trade On October 23
